root.name: Athens 2004
root.description: The only official game based on the 2004 Olympic Games in Athens, Greece. Featuring more than 25 different Summer Events -- including multiple disciplines in the seven Olympic Sports of Acquatics, Athletics, Gymnastics, Archery, Equestrian, Shooting and Weightlifting -- 64 represented countries and three modes of gameplay.

similar_games.game: Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games
